content: आनुलोम्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} ‘In the direction of the hair,’ produced in natural or direct order. --म्यं [अनुलोमस्य भावः कर्म वा ब्राह्म° ष्यञ्] {@--1@} Natural or direct order, proper arrangement; आनुलोम्येन संभूता जात्या ज्ञेयास्त एव ते <ls>Ms. 10. 5</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 10.">13.</ls> {@--2@} Regular series or succession. {@--3@} Favourableness, fit disposition. {@--4@} Bringing to one's right place.
